description:
We’re reinventing the way you play games by introducing MONETIZED interoperable skills, attributes & items that carry through all the games you play.

The NEVERDIE API & SDK tools allow game developers to easily integrate the NEVERDIE Coin & Teleport Token into their game design & reward gamers with monetized skills, attributes & inventory items directly into their NEVERDIE Wallet

While other blockchain gaming platforms focus on facilitating the exchange of digital assets that still can only be used in their game of origin, the NEVERDIE ecosystem provides developers with a formula to create interoperable MONETIZED assets that are balanced to be utilized across multiple games.

The NEVERDIE Coin & Teleport Token systems provide infrastructure for an inclusive blockchain ecosystem to drive a trillion dollar virtual goods economy & gamefied jobs.
name: Teleport Token
